title: 01/15/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/15/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show we had a jam packed guest list. New Head Coach of the Texas Longhorns Steve Sarkisian joined us to discuss his success at Alabama, and his journey back to becoming a Head Coach. Sideline Reporter for Sunday Night Football on NBC calls in to talk broadcasting during a snowstorm, and how she goes about getting halftime interviews with Coaches. Former Jags Pro Bowl Lineman joins in on the conversation about Jacksonville's new head coach, Urban Meyer. And Mike Wilbon says Bird/Parrish/McHale is the best "Big 3" of all time.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show we had a jam packed guest list. New Head Coach of the Texas Longhorns Steve Sarkisian joined us to discuss his success at Alabama, and his journey back to becoming a Head Coach. Sideline Reporter for Sunday Night Football on NBC calls in to talk broadcasting during a snowstorm, and how she goes about getting halftime interviews with Coaches. Former Jags Pro Bowl Lineman joins in on the conversation about Jacksonville's new head coach, Urban Meyer. And Mike Wilbon says Bird/Parrish/McHale is the best "Big 3" of all time.
